name: Find Things BoatShip Version
description:
Find Things BoatShip Version!!!
Start playing the most exciting hidden object game with the most beautiful and dramatic theme! Find artfully hidden objects in these boat scenes.
Features:
-20 challenging levels!
-Play High Scores or relaxed Hidden Object!
-Find Objects 3 different ways: Image, Outline and Text!
-Hints available if you get stuck!
-Zoom feature for those smaller objects if necessary!
